name: Mary Alice "Molly" Bennett
bio: When Mary Alice Bennett was born on 3 August 1887, in Alabama, United States, her father, William Beauregard Bennett, was 25 and her mother, Delaney H. Mathews, was 29. She had at least 8 sons and 4 daughters with Elias Jackson Lee. She lived in Brooks, Covington, Alabama, United States in 1940 and Montezuma, Covington, Alabama, United States for about 1 years. She died on 12 October 1950, in McKenzie, Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 63, and was buried in Bethel Primitive Baptist Church Cemetery, Covington, Alabama, United States.
